meta_description: Together, the Legion of Honor and de Young make up San Francisco’s largest public arts institution.
hours_text:
##  MLK Day Jan 19 + Extended hours Jan 16–17 + 23–24 

The de Young is open on Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Mon, Jan 19. _Art of Manga_ is open until 8:30 pm Fri–Sat, Jan 16–17, and Fri–Sat, Jan 23–24.

##  MLK Day Jan 19 + Extended hours Jan 16–17 + 23–24 

The de Young is open on Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Mon, Jan 19. _Art of Manga_ is open until 8:30 pm Fri–Sat, Jan 16–17, and Fri–Sat, Jan 23–24.

##  MLK Day Jan 19 + Extended hours Jan 16–17 + 23–24 

The de Young is open on Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Mon, Jan 19. _Art of Manga_ is open until 8:30 pm Fri–Sat, Jan 16–17, and Fri–Sat, Jan 23–24.
accessibility_text:
##  Jump to 

  * Deaf, hard of hearing, or Deaf / Blind
  * Low vision or blind
  * Language access
  * Mobility / accessible parking
  * Access program

##  Jump to 

  * Deaf, hard of hearing, or Deaf / Blind
  * Low vision or blind
  * Language access
  * Mobility / accessible parking
  * Access program
  * de Young Social Story
  * Art in ASL
  * Other

We are committed to offering services that make our collections, exhibitions, and programs accessible to all visitors. Programs and visiting options for individuals with disabilities as well as other underserved populations in the community are crucial for creating equity in access to the arts.

General admission to the de Young and Legion of Honor is complimentary for those who have disabilities, and includes free admission for a guest, pending availability. **Please contact**[**access@famsf.org**](mailto:access@famsf.org)**to request access tickets prior to your visit.**

Access membership ($99) is a discounted membership level for people with disabilities. Access membership includes free admission for one member, a caregiver, and a guest, invitations to Member Previews, 10% off at the de Young and Legion of Honor Museum Stores, and a subscription to our Member Monthly email newsletter and _Fine Arts_ magazine. Please contact [membership@famsf.org](mailto:membership@famsf.org) or call 415.750.3636 (Monday–Friday, 9 am–5 pm) to become a member.
